spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent layout preservation. Room adjacencies and wall alignments are highly accurate. Minor deductions for the exclusion of some window panes and slight shifting of the bathroom door on the upper right.

structural_fidelity.notes: Zero hallucinations or missing rooms. No text or measurement lines present. Floating model on correct neutral background.

furniture_mapping.notes: Clean block-style furniture. The kitchen counter configuration is almost exact. Small deduction for the minor scale discrepancy of the dining chairs compared to the table.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Good low-poly style and lighting. Deduction for the camera angle: it is a high-angle perspective but slightly more top-down/planimetric than a true 45-degree isometric orthographic view.

detected_errors.description: Camera angle is closer to a 3D floor plan view than a 45-degree orthographic isometric view.
Minor door/window orientation shifts in the bathroom and exterior balcony access.
